*Updated on  December 11, 2022*
<BR>

Passionate, knowledgeable, and self-motivated neuroscientist experienced in aging research. Skilled in delivering scientific information to diverse audiences and building collaborative relationships with scientific thought leaders. Twice-published lead author and experienced presenter. Creative and analytical thinker with a strong scientific acumen and a command of practical statistical methods. Effective and confident communicator who enjoys engaging in impactful conversations while creating and maintaining strong working relationships with colleagues. Willingness and ability to travel extensively and relocate if necessary. Excited to build relationships with both established and rising-star key opinion leaders (KOLs), healthcare professionals (HCPs), and all stakeholders that will provide added value to achieve company strategic objectives. Looking to bring relevant and valuable skills into an industry role as a MSL in a growing pharmaceutical company.
